data.message: Folks, I dunno what you've done but this latest update is absolutely awful. My notifications are all over the place, I'm not getting the usual notifications from close friends anymore and my feed is stuck and/or posts are appearing in duplicate. It's a terrible update. Surely social media should enable you to 'socialise' with the people you actually want to 'socialise' with.

replies.message: Hi Sinéad. We're sorry you're experiencing this. We want to help solve the problem as quickly as possible. You can learn how to report the issue here: http://bit.ly/2yOIMyz. -Tenaya
I've done that already, as I have done countless times on countless other issues. The majority of my friends are complaining about the same issues I've highlighted.
